title: 9to5Rewards: Last chance to win the new Mac Studio from MacStadium [Giveaway]
content:
Readers have just over a week left to enter 9to5Rewards biggest giveaway of the year. Thanks to MacStadium we’ll be giving readers the opportunity to enter and win the new Mac Studio from Apple, until April 24. For more on MacStadium hosted Mac services and to enter the Mac Studio giveaway, head below:
